metadata.title: CVE-2014-4883 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: resolv.c in the DNS resolver in uIP, and dns.c in the DNS resolver in lwIP1.4.1 and earlier, does not use random values for ID fields and sourceports of DNS query packets, which makes it easier for man-in-the-middleattackers to conduct cache-poisoning attacks via spoofed reply packets.

criterions.comment: lwipv6 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
